---
title: "All Projects"
listing:
  - id: all_projects
    contents: 
    - "*/*.qmd"
    - "!*/*/*.qmd"
    sort: date desc
    type: grid
    grid-item-border: false
    grid-columns: 1
    page-size: 10
    image-height: 250px
    image-placeholder: ../../style/images/placeholder_1.gif
    max-description-length: 250
    categories: unnumbered
    sort-ui: true
    filter-ui: true
    fields: [title, subtitle, description, date, categories, image]

page-layout: full
title-block-banner: false
---
